title: Full emulator support in WinAppDeployCmd
body: There appears to be no way to deploy an app to a Windows 10 Emulator outside of manually doing so in Visual Studio. We also have no entries listed for Windows 10 emulators (running or not) in the 'devices' output.

comments.body: We really miss the possibility to deploy already built appx packages to emulator on UWP as we did on WP 8.1 (using the tool "Windows Phone Application Deployment (8.1)" from WindowsPhone SDK).
